meanings.definition: A public entertainment of wild animal contests and other exhibitions.
meanings.sent1: The rodeos in town featured exciting animal competitions.
meanings.sent2: People from all over gathered to watch the rodeos with wild animal shows.
meanings.sent3: At the rodeos, the monkeys and lions put on a thrilling performance.
meanings.sent4: Her chaotic life felt like a rodeos of emotions, each one wilder than the last.
meanings.sent5: The rodeos were a spectacle of roaring lions and daring acrobats.

meanings.definition: A contest in which cowboys show their skill at riding broncos, roping calves, wrestling steers, etc.
meanings.sent1: The rodeos showcased the cowboys' talents in bronco riding and calf roping.
meanings.sent2: Every year, the town hosts a rodeos where cowboys compete in various events.
meanings.sent3: The rodeos turned into a comical scene when the cowboys tried to ride the sheep.
meanings.sent4: Facing his fears, he entered the rodeos of life, ready to conquer any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The rodeos were a display of bravery and skill, with cowboys and horses working together.
